UniformAmmo.name: Specialist's Overcoat
UniformAmmo.description: Warden specialists require a uniform designed to optimize their capacity to haul a variety of heavy ammunition.

UniformArmour.name: Gunner's Breastplate
UniformArmour.description: Repourposed from ancient wars, these armour plates are highly effective at stopping enemy small arms fire. That protection comes at the cost of weight, and the wearer will feel quite restricted and encumbered.

UniformEngineer.name: Sapper Gear
UniformEngineer.description: Caoivish engineers are legendary in song and nature. They wear specialized uniforms, outfitted with belts and bags for easy access to tools and handheld materials.

UniformMedic.name: Physician's Jacket
UniformMedic.description: Physicians in the Warden army are umatched and this uniform has a plethora of pockets and bags designed to carry and deploy first aid gear easily.

general: $First Aid Kits and Trauma Kits have reduced encumbrance

UniformOfficer.name: Officer's Regalia
UniformOfficer.description: A formal uniform that denotes a regiment's leading officer. While impractical, the officer on duty may use their authority to discipline subordinates without reperation. Officers hold an important role in the Warden Military, dating back to ancient times when Caoiva was ruled by a dozen kings.

UniformScout.name: Outrider's Mantle
UniformScout.description: The Warden army relies on outriders to provide and recieve vital intelligence. Their gear is sturdy and well-suited for extended operations in rugget terrain and inclement weather.

general: $High chance of not being detected by enemy intelligence

UniformSnow.name: Caoivish Parka
UniformSnow.description: Born and bred in the northern cold, this heavy parka protects Warden infantry from all but the worst blizzards.

UniformTank.name: Padded Boiler Suit
UniformTank.description: Caoivish armour is unmatched in its design and resilience. All crew are provided with a sturdy boilersuit and satchel belts to access essential tools required for tank maintenance and operation.
